isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - HYDRAULIC PRESSURE GOVERNOR - ECM DIAGNOSTICS

svcproc.title: ECM DIAGNOSTICS

para.emph: HYDRAULIC PRESSURE SIGNAL OUT OF RANGE LOW

svcproc.para: An out of range low code 216 will be set by the ECM if the signal voltage is less than 0.039 volts for more than 1 second. When this code is set, the HGE function is disabled.
Code 216 may be set due to an open or short to ground on the signal circuit, a defective sensor or connector or an open VREF circuit at the sensor.

para.emph: HYDRAULIC PRESSURE SIGNAL OUT OF RANGE HIGH

svcproc.para: An out of range high code 226 will be set by the ECM if the signal voltage is greater than 4.9 volts for more than 1 second. When this code is set, the HGE function is disabled.
Code 226 may be caused by a short on the signal circuit to a voltage source or a defective sensor.

para.emph: HYDRAULIC PRESSURE UNABLE TO ACHIEVE COMMANDED SET POINT

svcproc.para: The ECM has detected that the hydraulic system has not been capable of achieving the hydraulic pressure requested by the system. When this fault is active, the HGE function is disabled.
